channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
ok so i have a pimpscape source jdk6u5, windows vista, and im on a laptop.......if u can help with the server tell me....
my compile code is...
[code]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
and the run code is...
[code]@echo offtitle Runserverset java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe"java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
and my CLASSPATH is..
[code]CLASSPATH=C:\ProgramFiles\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]
and the path code i am using is...
[code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin[/code]
anyone who can help me please do i have been trying for 4 weeks to make a server .... :mad: :mad: AND if it is impossible to make ur own server on a laptop please tell me.........

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @zachisbomb zachisbomb
item.description:
@zachisbomb wrote:

i got an error saying exception in main java lang or something like that… idk how to take a screen shot…

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @numa numa
item.description:
@numa wrote:

Instead of your “run code” as you have it above, try this instead:

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

Note the line breaks, and the path to the correct JDK (you were calling update 3 when you stated you have 5).

Read full topic

well can u help me insteaed of telling me im retarded… are you using jdk 6u5? if so what is ur compile and run codes and ur path and classpath codes

item.description:

i use a laptop and my server works fine, so read the tuts better and maybe it will come to ya… unless ur retarted…

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @zachisbomb zachisbomb
item.description:
@zachisbomb wrote:

ok so i have a pimpscape source jdk6u5, windows vista, and im on a laptop…if u can help with the server tell me…

my compile code is…

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

and the run code is…

@echo offtitle Runserverset java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe"java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

and my CLASSPATH is…

CLASSPATH=C:\ProgramFiles\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

anyone who can help me please do i have been trying for 4 weeks to make a server … :mad: :mad: AND if it is impossible to make ur own server on a laptop please tell me…
